customer_name: Out Of The Box Art Studio
site_name: OUT OF THE BOX ART STUDIO
narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
This facility meets the minimum requirements for obtaining a Class "C" license.  
The license fee should be sent to the following address:
USDA, APHIS, Animal Care
920 Main Campus Dr, Suite 200
Raleigh, NC  27606
The pre-licensing process must be completed including fees processed by February 8, 2018 or the application fee
will be forfeit and you will be required to to wait 6 mths to reapply.
The inspection and exit briefing conducted with the owner.
